resources.string:

 Jethalal Katariya : +91 9849059028 
 
Email us: 
 njkatariya1607@gmail.com

Introducing TTJJ:\n\n
Nischay J Katariya\n\n
Dear All,\n
I am Nischay J Katariya S/O Jethalal Katariya a Computer Science Engineering
graduate. I joined my father in the year 2013. I welcome you to TTJJ which stands for “Trade
Through Javerchand Jethalal “.\n\n
When I joined him I always wanted to use technology in my business. Finally I came up
with an idea where our firm could be in contact with each and everyone in our clients through an
android application. The application is really very simple. We give you the daily trend of few
commodities like Turmeric, Sesame seeds and cumin seeds from the supplying centers,
weather the trend is up, down or steady when compared to the previous day. This application is
so simple that it can be used by a farmer, trader, exporter or anyone around the world. Based
on these reports that we give, you can decide whether it is the right time to buy any of the above
mentioned commodities. The application will also give you weekly notifications which will
summarize you about the trades and demand in these commodities.\n\n
Our Vision:\n
1. To create experiences where passion and purpose come together.\n
2. To establish TTJJ in the global arena.\n\n
Our Mission:\n
Our mission is to make TTJJ a global enterprise fulfilling its clients’ needs in terms of
quality, quantity and pricing so that it converts its clients into brand advocates.\n\n
Our Strength:\n
1. Competitive pricing\n
2. Quality Products\n
3. On time delivery\n\n
We have always delivered what we promised. We think our clients enjoy working with us
which benefits their business because they believe that we would deliver what has been
promised. We have the experience that a client needs so that the trust and belief gets stronger
every time they work through us.\n\n
So with the above vision, mission and strengths we present you TTJJ.\n\n
Our History\n
Javerchand Jethalal & Co was started on 4 th September 1955 by Late Sri ManjiBhai Katariya.
He was a classic first generation entrepreneur. He was a man who started small, dreamt big
and used a combination of grit and perseverance to create this company.\n
He had a difficult journey in the beginning but he believed that this would create wonders some
day. He tried to keep his business to a manageable size so that he never lost sight of the
relationships that he had built over the years.\n
The success of this company would not be possible if we do not mention Jethalal Katariya who
was the working force behind this company.
Jethalal Katariya’s photo\n
Jethalal Katariya was very keen in joining his father in his business at a very young age. He
joined his father in the year 1969. Following his father’s principles he took the business to new
heights. Breaking all the barriers, he expanded the company’s operations to major parts of the
country.\n\n
Because of Jethalal Katariyas ill health he could not continue trading but he started broking firm
with his son in an improvised name i.e. TTJJ.
